item.title: SWN
item.description: score:124 Chances: Southwestern Energy is scheduled to release its fourth quarter earnings on February 22, 2024.The company possesses the right combination of key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report.The company has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

item.title: X
item.description: score:-22 Chances: U.S. Steel Corp. has the potential for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Nippon Steel Corp. made an aggressive all-cash offer for United States Steel Corp., indicating potential for a high acquisition price. Risks: The acquisition bid from Nippon Steel Corp.
